file_content.text: I've already ordered a complete overhaul of the base's security systems.
You must recover those stolen plans.
Pardon the intrusion. I am Lieutenant Zerdran, here at Moff Braynor's request. My field: crisis control.
I have no time for small talk.
Impossible odds, yet still you manage to recover the stolen plans. Well done.
Approximately nine hours ago, a Republic Spec Ops team infiltrated this base. Sliced the mainframe, gained unrestricted access to the Imperial network.
We severed the connection, but not before the intruders stole classified data files outlining the Empire's campaign on Hoth.
You're all incompetent.
I was only called in after the breach took place. But I assure you, disciplinary action has been taken.
The assault was executed by Xesh Squad. Infiltration unit, specializes in high-risk ops. Responsible for the Imperial Citadel bombing a few years back.
We've tracked the Xesh commandos to an abandoned Ortolan outpost. They're boxed in, but firmly entrenched and awaiting extraction.
Then go in and get them.
Xesh Squad established a defensive perimeter in record time, turned the outpost into a veritable fortress. We can't move on them.
That's why we must act fast.
Recovery of the stolen plans is the Empire's top priority right now. Moff Braynor has requested you resolve the matter. Swiftly.
I'm still reviewing the footage, assessing any flaws in our security. I can make my report available to you, if you wish.
Who were the intruders?
I'll pass. [Refuse quest]
Moff Braynor will not be pleased.
I'll head out immediately.
The quicker the better. Only a matter of time before Xesh Squad's evac arrives and the plans are lost to us forever.
I will destroy Xesh Squad.
Bad day for the Empire.
Quite.
It's become clear that we require outside assistance to defuse the situation.
Moff Braynor will be delighted to hear of your success--and of Xesh Squad's demise, no doubt.
This does not concern Sith.
I was under the impression the Sith and the Empire shared a common interest.
So they're trapped. Excellent.
At best, we're at a stalemate.
I'll do what I can to ensure we never suffer through a similar incident. In the meantime, you have my thanks.
Let's talk payment first.
I have been authorized to provide compensation on successful retrieval of the plans.
This is a huge setback.
How did they get in?
Why come to me?
